title: Hybrid Documentation Sprint + Tauri Migration Plan
description: Comprehensive 6-week plan combining documentation sprint with Tauri migration

tasks.title: Security Vulnerability Fixes
tasks.description: Fix high-severity lodash vulnerability and hardcoded credentials
tasks.notes: From security audit: lodash CVE-2021-23337, hardcoded credentials in database.ts

tasks.title: Critical Frame Documentation
tasks.description: Document the 29 frames with blockers identified in comprehensive analysis
tasks.notes: Focus on frames with syntax errors and missing modules

tasks.title: OCTOSPINE Self-Documentation Framework
tasks.description: Create automated documentation generation using OCTOSPINE itself
tasks.notes: Use OCTOSPINE to document OCTOSPINE - meta-documentation approach

tasks.title: Integration Documentation
tasks.description: Document integration patterns and webhook configurations
tasks.notes: Focus on 27.3% integrated frames and improve integration capabilities

tasks.title: Tauri Project Assessment
tasks.description: Analyze existing Tauri migration roadmap and current state

tasks.title: Tauri Dependencies Setup
tasks.description: Install and configure Tauri CLI and core dependencies

tasks.title: Tauri Project Structure
tasks.description: Create Tauri project structure alongside existing React code
tasks.notes: Preserve 95%+ of existing React components and TypeScript types

tasks.title: Documentation Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Review and validate all generated documentation
tasks.notes: Ensure documentation meets established frame minimums

tasks.title: Documentation-Tauri Integration Planning
tasks.description: Plan how documentation will support Tauri migration
tasks.notes: Leverage documented system for smoother Tauri migration

tasks.title: Tauri Permissions Configuration
tasks.description: Configure Tauri permissions and security model
tasks.notes: Apply security best practices from documentation sprint

tasks.title: React-Tauri Bridge Implementation
tasks.description: Implement bridge between React frontend and Tauri backend
tasks.notes: Migrate API calls to native system calls via Tauri

tasks.title: Migration Documentation
tasks.description: Document Tauri migration process and lessons learned
tasks.notes: Create migration guide for future reference

tasks.title: System Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test full system integration with Tauri backend
tasks.notes: Comprehensive testing of all system capabilities

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize performance and resolve any issues
tasks.notes: Leverage native performance benefits of Tauri

tasks.title: Final Migration and Deployment
tasks.description: Complete migration and deploy production version
tasks.notes: Final approval and deployment with full documentation

tasks.title: Final Documentation Review
tasks.notes: Ensure all documentation is complete and accessible

risks.title: Documentation Sprint Scope Creep
risks.description: Risk of documentation sprint expanding beyond planned scope
risks.mitigation: Strict prioritization of highest-risk frames first

risks.title: Tauri Migration Complexity
risks.description: Risk of Tauri migration being more complex than anticipated
risks.mitigation: Leverage existing 508-line roadmap and 486 Tauri files

risks.title: Resource Contention
risks.description: Risk of documentation and migration tasks competing for resources
risks.mitigation: Parallel execution with clear dependencies and OCTOSPINE orchestration

risks.title: Security Vulnerabilities
risks.description: Risk of security issues during migration
risks.mitigation: Address security issues in Week 1 documentation sprint

synergies.title: Documentation-Guided Migration
synergies.description: Use documented system understanding to guide Tauri migration
synergies.benefit: Reduced migration risks and smoother transition

synergies.title: Security-First Approach
synergies.description: Address security issues in documentation sprint before migration

synergies.title: OCTOSPINE Self-Orchestration
synergies.description: Use OCTOSPINE to manage both documentation and migration

synergies.title: Knowledge Preservation
synergies.description: Document migration process for future reference
synergies.benefit: Reusable knowledge and improved future migrations
